detail_desc: Pull-on, ankle-length trousers in a patterned viscose weave with an elasticated waist and side pockets in a loose fit with tapered legs.
Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping weave with buttons down the front and a high waist with partially stitched pleats down the front. Two slits at the front and one at the back. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit knitted in soft organic cotton with buttons on one shoulder and at the crotch. Long raglan sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.

Sleeveless, one-shoulder body in double-layered jersey with a single shoulder strap with a knot at the top. Seam at the hips. a microfibre lower section and a lined gusset with a press-stud fastening.
Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a high collar, contrasting colour zip and concealed zipped pockets at the front. Elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Open jacket in airy, crinkled viscose with low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves.
Leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jumper knitted in soft, garter-stitched cotton with a hood, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cold shoulder top in a soft viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated, lace-trimmed flounce at the shoulders.
Cold shoulder playsuit in patterned jersey with narrow shoulder straps and flounces that go round the arms. Elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Calf-length wrapover leather skirt that fastens with two leather ties around the waist. Asymmetric hem.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Spacious shopper in soft imitation leather with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Narrow, adjustable shoulder strap. Size 12.5x28x29 cm.
Biker jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped front pockets, a zip at the cuffs and raw, frayed edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Short shorts in a patterned viscose weave with wide, covered elastication at the waist and pockets in the side seams. Wide legs with rounded hems.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Soft smartphone case in transparent plastic with a detachable strap. Can be worn around the neck or over one shoulder. Length of strap approx. 120 cm.

Shirt in washed cotton denim with a turn-down collar, classic front with press-studs and a yoke at the front and back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Playsuit in stretch cotton twill with a smocked bodice and a square neckline with a small frill trim. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems, pockets in the side seams and short, wide legs.
Striped jumper in a soft knit containing alpaca wool with long sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved Henley shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
Patterned swim shorts with a decorative drawstring and elastication at the back. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Relaxed-fit top in linen jersey with a V-neck, short dolman sleeves and a knot detail at the hem.
Fitted, calf-length dress in viscose jersey with a small opening and a draped knot detail at the top. Decorative seam and a high slit at the front.
Hairband of braided imitation suede with decorative fabric flowers and elastic at the back of the neck.
V-neck satin top with a lace trim at the top and super-skinny shoulder straps. Unlined.
Triangular scarf in a soft, felted wool and cashmere blend with fringing along the bottom edge. Size 100x200 cm.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Straight-cut top in an airy viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool and some alpaca wool. Cable-knit front, long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Skirt in jersey with contrasting colour trims, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. The cotton content of the skirt is organic.

Maxi dress in a crêpe weave made partly from recycled polyester with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt with high slits in the sides. Unlined.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn either as a jacket or as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, concealed zip down the front and side pockets. Unlined. Regular Fit. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft viscose jersey in a double layer at the top. Gentle V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam and drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and wide legs.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side stripes. Elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Double-layered, drawstring hood with a wrapover front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved cotton piqué top with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and narrow ribbing at the cuffs.
Patterned fabric-covered Alice band.
Sleeveless, A-line jersey dress with slightly deeper armholes, pockets in the side seams and a double layer at the top.
5-pocket stretch cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Long-sleeved shirt in washed denim with buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke at the back, flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, a zip fly and button, and slim legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Waterproof trainers in woven fabric with imitation leather sections, a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles.
Pencil case with a print motif and zip at the top. Unlined. Size 5x6x20 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Cotton corduroy jacket with wide stripes and a collar. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Short skirt in woven fabric with decorative buttons at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Jersey lining.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Short, wide top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Trousers in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric. Hoodie with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Sandals with crossover straps at the front and elastic heel straps. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a sequin-embroidered motif on the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Three-strand thin metal chain necklace with pendants. Adjustable length, 38-46 cm.
Slightly shorter top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, button placket and long sleeves.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with double-layered, elasticated ribbing at the cuffs.

Jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front, notch lapels with decorative press-studs and a zip at the cuffs. Zipped side pockets, a small front pocket with a flap and press-stud, and a detachable, adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the hem. Lined.

Short-sleeved shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.
Shorter blouse in a patterned linen and cotton weave with a round neckline and low-cut back with a tie detail at the hem. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication. Lined.
Bras in microfibre and mesh with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in satin with a V-neck and wide flounced trim at the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Comfort blanket in soft velour with an animal-shaped head and paws. Polyester filling. Length approx. 25 cm.
Polo-neck collar in a cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool. Fleece lining.
Set with a denim dress and jersey leggings. Dress with a collar, button placket, chest pocket and short, frilled sleeves. Patterned leggings with an elasticated waist.
Trousers in woven fabric with a sheen. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the side, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Jacket in washed denim with hard-worn details. Cut-off stand-up collar with a frayed edge, buttons down the front and a raw, frayed hem. Flap chest pockets with a button and buttons at the cuffs.
Hat in a soft knit with faux fur pompoms on top, a double-layered hem, earflaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
